articles.description: Sunny Deol and Ameesha Patel starrer Gadar 2 is ruling the theatres like anything. The film is breaking several records and crossed over Rs 200 crores in just a few days. This Anil Sharma directorial is a direct sequel to a 2001 film by the same name. Where U…
